description: System-generated unique identifier for this part–supplier record.
Identifier of the inventory part this supplier can provide; links to the parts master.
Boolean flag indicating whether this supplier is the preferred source for the part.
Identifier of the supplier/vendor; links to the vendor master.
Supplier’s catalog/part number used on quotes and purchase orders.
Identifier of the preferred manufacturer for this part when purchased from this supplier; confirm with SME.
Estimated procurement lead time from this supplier for the part, typically in days; confirm unit.
Preferred shipping method or carrier for orders to this supplier; confirm code set.
Unit price paid on the most recent purchase of this part from this supplier, in base currency.
Timestamp of the most recent purchase transaction for this part from this supplier.
Most recent quoted unit price from this supplier for the part.
Date/time of the most recent price quote received from the supplier.
Free-text notes about this part–supplier relationship (pricing, terms, alternates, etc.).
System timestamp when this record was last updated.
Timestamp of the last user-initiated modification to this record; likely overlaps with user_date_modified; confirm with SME.
Identifier of the user who originally created this part–supplier record.
Date/time when the record was created.
Identifier of the user who last changed the record.
Date/time when a user last modified the record; may duplicate user_last_modified; confirm with SME.
